extendedInfo.description: Elifoot is a famous, classic style Manager Game.It has been classified as one of the most addictive games ever, due to its simplicity and entertainment capabilities.Each player plays the role of manager and coach of a club, buys and sell players, manages the finances and selects the players for each match.Among four divisions, each season comprises league and cup competitions.ELIFOOT 2012 MOBILE FULL version has several advantages comparing to the FREE version:* Start playing in the first division* Up to 8 simultaneous human players* Accept invitations to manage teams in the first division* No ads

reviews.title: Bacana
reviews.comment: Manero lembra bem o das antigas mas falta buscar jogadorrs p comprar e tb o historico de titulos qntas copas e campeonatos cada tecnico e times ganharam

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: I lose 2-1 away, first game for cup, and I win second 1-0 at home. So I should win no? But I lose.
reviews.author: Bruno Ferreira

reviews.title: Bom!
reviews.comment: Gostei! S\303\263 poderia ter substituicao durante o jogo, penalties, lesoes e fazer propostas para jogadores. Fora isso vale mto!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 1 problem
reviews.comment: To hard to not get sacked.  I got my team promoted then came 6th(not relegated) and got sacked. Good apart from that
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Cant buy in the game, only in auction.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: 343 is the way to go. To improve: wage bar is terrible to manage when players got skill about 60+.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Naff
reviews.comment: Wont let you sub during game, I equalised on aggerate on cup 6 times and still got booted out of cup. Better manager games out there. This ones bog basic and restrictive. Dont waste your time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tecnicos
reviews.comment: nao sei pra galera mas pra mim o q mais importa eh o ranking de tecnicos pq de times a gt troca. so q eu vi q na parte onde ele conta os titulos por treinador tem um bug, ele nao separa os titulos de reinador por copa e por liga e sim soma as duas. eh um bug pq tem la as duas colunas (liga e copa) e nao aparece diferenciado por treinador... sera q ja corrigiram isso e eu nao atualizei? se alguem souber responde ae...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Melhor t\303\241tica
reviews.comment: Qual a melhor t\303\241tica para a jogar? Eu j\303\241 fui contratado por clubes muito bons, mas os jogadores n\303\243o evoluem mais, n\303\243o passam dos 90. E s\303\263 consigo ganhar a ta\303\247a, o campeonato \303\251 imposs\303\255vel!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bom jogo!
reviews.comment: S\303\263 tenho pena que o upgrade esteja t\303\243o caro para um jogo destes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Muito bom, mas...
reviews.comment: O jogo \303\251 muito bom, mas ainda falta poder comprar jogadores sem ser no leilao, pedir emprestimo bancario, substituicoes no meio do jogo, penaltis, cartoes amarelo e vermelho no meio da partida e uma coisa importante, os times de varzea que nao entram nem na 4\302\260 divisao... Tirando isso o jogo esta de parabens, sei que muita coisa sera inserida em breve
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recursos
reviews.comment: Ainda faltam muitos recursos para o jogo dicas bom, mas d\303\241 pra perder meia horinha.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Free?
reviews.comment: Obrigado a fazer upgrade depois de jogar uma s\303\251rie de vezes ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eli
reviews.comment: Viciante, se o desenvolvimento continuar ser\303\241 um sucesso penso eu.
